# vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatTwoComponent32Float

**Case**

A little-endian 32-bit, two-component pixel format.

## Declaration

```swift
case formatTwoComponent32Float
```

## Two-component format constants

- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatTwoComponent8**: An 8-bit, two-component pixel format with black equal to zero.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatTwoComponent16Half**: A little-endian 16-bit, two-component pixel format.

items.description: An 8-bit, two-component pixel format with black equal to zero.
